wikipedia_page.main: Claudia Jane Herington Williams (born 1933) is a British artist known for her paintings, often large colourful portraits. Although born in England, Williams has spent the majority of her career painting in Wales.

link_mentions.page: List of people with surname Williams

response: Born in the village of Llanystumdwy, near Criccieth, Gwynedd, he studied at Bangor Normal College (1951-3) before moving on to Birmingham College of Art, before becoming a teacher in Anglesey.  He married fellow artist Claudia Williams in 1953, and altered the spelling of his surname when he discovered that there was another painter of the same name. "Book review: Gwilym Prichard, Claudia Williams: A perfect picture of when love and art collide", The Independent, 22 September 2013. Retrieved 7 June 2015 Their son, Ceri Pritchard, is a painter.
